name: Bloodsaw
description:
A physics-based action game with multiple gamemodes, and an advanced damage system.

You can play in multiple gamemodes, like the Arena, Factory, with more being added almost every update.

You can earn skill points in every gamemode, and spend them on character upgrades like impact resistance, more damage, higher lung capacity, etc, and powers, like the Dash, Slowmotion, etc.

With the damage system, every limb can be seperately damaged, can bleed, can feel pain, and can even break. You can also get concussions, drown, get melted in lava, get cut by sawblades, stomped on by a hammerhead, and more. Oh, and the same applies for all enemies.
